alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1245 PM EDT/1145 AM CDT/... At 1201 PM EDT/1101 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles south of Marianna to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Moose Pond, Clarksville and Ocheesee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
